section.title: User-Defined Tools
section.para: Users may add their own tools which they may wish to call quickly from Blue (i.e. a favorite soundFile editing program). Under 'Tools', select 'Manage Tools' to add, edit, delete, or reorder your tools. Allowable input here is 'tool name' which will be used by Blue for displaying on the tools menu, and 'command line' which Blue will use to run the program.
